Rants

Here are some random rants on Mailman, email, list servers, and other fun topics. They should be considered the opinions of the authors of the articles only.

  • Mailman Considered Beneficial, a rebuttal to the (in)famous JWZ article.

Papers

  • GNU Mailman, Internationalized, Warsaw, USENIX 2003 Annual Technical Conference, FREENIX Track.
  • Mailman - An Extensible Mailing List Manager Using Python, Manheimer, Warsaw, Viega, 7th International Python Conference in Houston, TX.
  • Mailman: The GNU Mailing List Manager, Viega, Warsaw, Manheimer, 12th Usenix Systems Administration Conference (LISA '98).

Logos

The Dragon De Monsyne created and donated two logos for Mailman which you can use to link back to the Mailman website. Sergio I. Rivera donated an alternative logo which is preferred by the Free Software Foundation.
Small Logo (110x35)
Large Logo (247x93)
FSF preferred logo (110x35)
